en.Your level progress will be lost!: Your level progress will be lost!
en.Watch a video to continue playing!: Watch a video to continue playing!
en.Use the swap booster to change the place: Use the swap booster to change the place of two objects!
en.Use the star wand to crush one cookie!: Use the axe to remove a single object!
en.Use the horizontal pin to clear the whol: Use the horizontal pin to clear the whole row!
en.Use the vertical pin to clear the whole: Use the vertical pin to clear the whole column!
en.Nice job! You earned 3 stars! Enjoy your: Nice job! You earned 3 stars! Enjoy your gift!
en.Nice job! You won 3 times in a row! Enjo: Nice job! You won 3 times in a row! Enjoy your gift!
en.You watched all videos for today. Come b: You watched all videos for today. Come back tomorrow!
en.This is how you Match 3 Cookies: This is how you match 3 objects.
en.The cookies are on waffles! Save them by: The objects are on dirty surfaces! Remove them by making matches on them!
en.Keep matching and remove all waffles!: Keep matching and remove all dirty surfaces!
en.Save the cookies from the blocker by mat: Free the objects from blockers by matching them!
en.Make matches around the ice to break it!: Make matches around the ice to break it!
en.Stones block the cookies! Match blocked: Stones block your objects! Match blocked objects to remove the stone!
en.Stop infections from spreading! Make a m: Stop the jelly from spreading! Make a match next to the jelly to remove it!
en.I need help with a gate!: I need help with a gate!
en.Bring the strawberries to the bottom of: Bring your basket to the bottom of the board by matching below it!
en.Watch a video to try again: Watch a video to try again
en.Did you notice? Matching 4 gives you a s: Did you notice? Matching 4 gives you a special surprise!
en.Crunch! Now reach 2000 Points in 24 Move: Crunch! Now reach 2000 Points in 24 Moves!
en.Nice! Now match the bombs to make cookie: Nice! Now match the color bombs to let the objects explode!
en.Match around the Ice to break it!: Match around the ice to break it!
en.Great! Now break all the ice and collect: Great! Now break all the ice and remove all surfaces!
en.This ice is stronger! Match twice to bre: This ice is stronger! Match twice next to it to break it!
en.Now that's crunchy! Break it all! Fast!: Now that's crunchy! Break it all! Fast!
en.Match next to Chests to unlock them!: Match next to the chests to unlock them!
en.Coins galor! Now collect your Waffles an: You found some coins! Now move on and complete the level goals!
en.Hey! You can Match 5 with your new Boost: Hey! You can Match 5 with your new Booster!
en.Try your new Booster to help you Match m: Try your new Booster to help you Match more!
en.Yum! Chocolate Waffles! They require two: There are moss overgrown surfaces! They require two matches to be cleared!
en.Choco-tastic! Now collect the items in 2: Well done! Now complete the remaining level goals.
en.Try this and see what happens!: Try this and see what happens!

de.Watch a video to get: Sieh eine Werbung an und erhalte
de.Your level progress will be lost!: Dein Fortschritt in diesem Level geht Verloren!
de.Watch a video to continue playing!: Video ansehen um weiter zu spielen!
de.Use the swap booster to change the place: Nutze den Tausch-Booster, um die Position zweier Objekte zu tauschen!
de.Use the star wand to crush one cookie!: Nutze die Axt, um ein einzelnes Objekt zu entfernen!
de.Use the horizontal pin to clear the whol: Nutze den Zeilen-Entferner, um eine Reihe zu löschen!
de.Use the vertical pin to clear the whole: Nutze den Spalten-Entferner, um eine Spalte zu löschen!
de.Nice job! You earned 3 stars! Enjoy your: Gut gemacht! Du hast 3 Sterne verdient! Viel Spass mit Deinem Geschenk!
de.Nice job! You won 3 times in a row! Enjo: Gut gemacht! Du hast 3 mal in Folge gewonnen! Viel Spass mit Deinem Geschenk!
de.Watch video to get more: Sieh eine Werbung an, um mehr zu erhalten
de.You watched all videos for today. Come b: Du hast für heute bereits alle Videos gesehen, versuche es morgen noch einmal!
de.The cookies are on waffles! Save them by: Die Objekte liegen auf schmutzigem Boden! Entferne den Schmutz, indem Du auf ihm kombinierst!
de.Keep matching and remove all waffles!: Kombiniere weiter und entferne alle schmutzigen Böden!
de.Save the cookies from the blocker by mat: Befreie die Objekte von den Blockern, indem Du sie kombinierst!
de.Make matches around the ice to break it!: Kombinieren neben Eisblöcken, um diese zu brechen!
de.Stones block the cookies! Match blocked: Steine blockieren Deine Objekte! Kombiniere blockierte Objekte, um die Steine zu entfernen!
de.Stop infections from spreading! Make a m: Hindere den Schleim daran, sich auszubreiten! Kombiniere neben dem Schleim, um ihn zu entfernen!
de.Complete missions to receive rewards!: Schließe Missionen ab, um Belohnungen zu erhalten!
de.I need help with a gate!: Ich brauche Hilfe mit einem Tor!
de.Bring the strawberries to the bottom of: Bringe den Korb bis zum Boden des Spielbrettes, indem Du unter ihm kombinierst!
de.Watch a video to try again: Sieh ein Video an, um es noch einmal zu probieren.
de.Did you notice? Matching 4 gives you a s: Hast Du bemerkt? Eine Vierer-Kombination beschert Dir eine besondere Überraschung!
de.Crunch! Now reach 2000 Points in 24 Move: Super! Nun erreiche 2000 Punkte mit weniger als 24 Zügen!
de.Nice! Now match the bombs to make cookie: Nett! Jetzt nutze die Farbbomben, um die Objekte explodieren zu lassen!
de.Match around the Ice to break it!: Kombiniere um das Eis herum, um es zu brechen!
de.Great! Now break all the ice and collect: Toll! Jetzt entferne alle Eisblöcke und Böden!
de.Nice! Keep playing to 500 points!: Schön! Spiele weiter und erreiche 500 Punkte!
de.This ice is stronger! Match twice to bre: Dieses Eis ist stärker! Du muss zweimal neben ihm kombinieren, um es zu brechen!
de.Now that's crunchy! Break it all! Fast!: Das ist knackig! Breche alles! Schnell!
de.Match next to Chests to unlock them!: Kombiniere neben den Kisten, um diese zu öffnen!
de.Coins galor! Now collect your Waffles an: Du hast einige Münzen gefunden! Spiele weiter und erreiche die Levelziele!
de.Hey! You can Match 5 with your new Boost: Hey! Mit deinem neuen Booster kannst Du 5 kombinieren!
de.Try your new Booster to help you Match m: Teste Deinen neuen Booster! Er hilft Dir, noch mehr zu kombinieren!
de.Yum! Chocolate Waffles! They require two: Hier sind moosbewachsene Flächen! Du musst zweimal kombinieren, um sie zu entfernen!
de.Choco-tastic! Now collect the items in 2: Gut gemacht! Jetzt erfülle die verbliebenen Levelziele.
de.Try this and see what happens!: Versuch das und schau was passiert!
de.Unlock at Level X: Spiel das frei ab Level X

es.Your level progress will be lost!: ¡Se perderá tu progreso en el nivel!
es.Use the swap booster to change the place: ¡Usa el potenciador de intercambio para cambiar el lugar de dos objetos!
es.Use the star wand to crush one cookie!: ¡Usa el hacha para eliminar un único objeto!
es.Use the horizontal pin to clear the whol: ¡Usa el pin horizontal para borrar la fila entera!
es.Use the vertical pin to clear the whole: ¡Usa el pin vertical para borrar la columna entera!
es.Nice job! You earned 3 stars! Enjoy your: ¡Buen trabajo! ¡Has conseguido 3 estrellas! ¡Disfruta de tu regalo!
es.Nice job! You won 3 times in a row! Enjo: ¡Buen trabajo! ¡Has ganado 3 veces consecutivas! ¡Disfruta de tu regalo!
es.Watch video to get more: Mira un vídeo para obtener más
es.You watched all videos for today. Come b: Has visto todos los vídeos para hoy. ¡Vuelve mañana!
es.This is how you Match 3 Cookies: Así es como se unen 3 objetos.
es.The cookies are on waffles! Save them by: ¡Los objetos están en superficies sucias! ¡Elimínalos estableciendo coincidencias entre ellos!
es.Keep matching and remove all waffles!: ¡Sigue estableciendo coincidencias y elimina todas las superficies sucias!
es.Save the cookies from the blocker by mat: ¡Libera los objetos de los bloqueadores haciendo que coincidan!
es.Make matches around the ice to break it!: ¡Establece coincidencias alrededor del hielo para romperlo!
es.Stones block the cookies! Match blocked: ¡Las piedras bloquean tus objetos! ¡Combina objetos bloqueados para eliminar la piedra!
es.Stop infections from spreading! Make a m: ¡Evita que la gelatina se propague! ¡Haz una coincidencia al lado de la gelatina para eliminarla!
es.Bring the strawberries to the bottom of: ¡Lleva tu cesta al pie del tablero estableciendo coincidencias debajo!
es.Watch a video to try again: Mira un vídeo para intentarlo de nuevo
es.Did you notice? Matching 4 gives you a s: ¿Te has enterado? ¡Conseguir 4 en raya te da una sorpresa especial!
es.Nice! Now match the bombs to make cookie: ¡Bien! ¡Haz coincidir las bombas de color para que los objetos exploten!
es.Match around the Ice to break it!: ¡Establece coincidencias alrededor del hielo para romperlo!
es.Great! Now break all the ice and collect: ¡Genial! ¡Ahora rompe todo el hielo y elimina todas las superficies!
es.This ice is stronger! Match twice to bre: ¡Este hielo es más fuerte! ¡Haz dos combinaciones al lado para romperlo!
es.Match next to Chests to unlock them!: ¡Haz combinaciones al lado de los cofres para desbloquearlos!
es.Coins galor! Now collect your Waffles an: ¡Has encontrado monedas! ¡Ahora avanza y completa las metas del nivel!
es.Hey! You can Match 5 with your new Boost: ¡Oye! ¡Puedes hacer 5 en raya con tu nuevo potenciador!
es.Try your new Booster to help you Match m: ¡Prueba tu nuevo potenciador para ayudarte a relacionar más!
es.Yum! Chocolate Waffles! They require two: ¡Hay superficies cubiertas de musgo! ¡Es necesario dos coincidencias para eliminarlas!
es.Choco-tastic! Now collect the items in 2: ¡Bien hecho! Ahora completa las metas del nivel que quedan.
es.Unlock at Level X: Se desbloquea en el nivel X

fr.Watch a video to continue playing!: Regardez une vidéo pour continuer à jouer !
fr.Use the swap booster to change the place: Utilisez le bonus « changement de place » afin que deux objets échangent leur place !
fr.Use the star wand to crush one cookie!: Utilisez la hache pour supprimer un seul élément !
fr.Use the horizontal pin to clear the whol: Utilisez la goupille horizontale pour effacer toute la rangée !
fr.Use the vertical pin to clear the whole: Utilisez la goupille verticale pour effacer toute la colonne !
fr.Nice job! You earned 3 stars! Enjoy your: Bravo ! Vous avez gagné 3 étoiles ! Vous avez reçu un cadeau !
fr.Nice job! You won 3 times in a row! Enjo: Bravo ! Vous avez gagné 3 fois d'affilée ! Vous avez reçu un cadeau !
fr.Watch video to get more: Regardez une vidéo pour en avoir plus
fr.You watched all videos for today. Come b: Vous avez regardé toutes les vidéos aujourd'hui. Revenez demain !
fr.The cookies are on waffles! Save them by: Les objets se trouvent sur des surfaces sales ! Supprimez-les en faisant des combinaisons par-dessus !
fr.Keep matching and remove all waffles!: Continuez à faire des combinaisons et faites disparaître toutes les surfaces sales !
fr.Save the cookies from the blocker by mat: Libérez les objets des éléments qui les bloquent en les combinant !
fr.Make matches around the ice to break it!: Faites des combinaisons autour de la glace afin de la briser !
fr.Stones block the cookies! Match blocked: Les pierres bloquent vos objets ! Combinez des objets bloqués afin de supprimer la pierre !
fr.Stop infections from spreading! Make a m: Empêchez la substance gluante de se propager ! Faites une combinaison près de la substance gluante afin de la faire disparaître !
fr.Complete missions to receive rewards!: Complétez des missions pour obtenir des récompenses !
fr.Bring the strawberries to the bottom of: Faites tomber votre panier tout en bas du plateau de jeu en faisant des combinaisons en dessous de celui-ci !
fr.Did you notice? Matching 4 gives you a s: Vous avez vu ? En combinant 4 gâteaux identiques, vous recevez une surprise spéciale!
fr.Crunch! Now reach 2000 Points in 24 Move: Croquez ! À présent, atteignez les 2000 points en 24 coups!
fr.Nice! Now match the bombs to make cookie: Joli ! À présent, combinez les bombes colorées afin de faire exploser les objets !
fr.Match around the Ice to break it!: Faites des combinaisons autour de la glace afin de la briser !
fr.Great! Now break all the ice and collect: Excellent ! À présent, brisez toute la glace et faites disparaître toutes les surfaces !
fr.Nice! Keep playing to 500 points!: Joli ! Continuez à jouer jusqu'à ce que vous atteigniez 500 points!
fr.This ice is stronger! Match twice to bre: La glace est plus solide ! Faites deux combinaisons près de celle-ci afin de la briser !
fr.Now that's crunchy! Break it all! Fast!: Ça c'est croustillant ! Cassez-la entièrement ! Vite!
fr.Match next to Chests to unlock them!: Faites des combinaisons près des coffres afin de les déverrouiller !
fr.Coins galor! Now collect your Waffles an: Vous avez trouvé quelques pièces ! À présent, continuez et réussissez les objectifs du niveau !
fr.Hey! You can Match 5 with your new Boost: Hé ! Vous pouvez faire des combinaisons de 5 gâteaux grâce à votre nouveau booster!
fr.Try your new Booster to help you Match m: Essayez votre nouveau booster afin de pouvoir combiner davantage de gâteaux!
fr.Yum! Chocolate Waffles! They require two: Il y a des surfaces envahies par la mousse ! Vous devez faire deux combinaisons par-dessus celles-ci pour les faire disparaître !
fr.Choco-tastic! Now collect the items in 2: Bien joué ! À présent, réussissez tous les autres objectifs du niveau.
fr.Try this and see what happens!: Essaye ça et regarde ce qu'il se passe!

it.Your level progress will be lost!: I tuoi progressi nel livello non verranno salvati!
it.Watch a video to continue playing!: Guarda il video per continuare a giocare!
it.Use the swap booster to change the place: Usa l'abilita scambio per scambiare di posto due oggetti!
it.Use the star wand to crush one cookie!: Usa l'ascia per eliminare un solo oggetto!
it.Use the horizontal pin to clear the whol: Usa un incastro orizzontale per eliminare l'intera riga!
it.Use the vertical pin to clear the whole: Usa un incastro verticale per eliminare l'intera colonna!
it.Nice job! You earned 3 stars! Enjoy your: Ottimo lavoro! Hai guadagnato 3 stelle! Goditi il tuo premio!
it.Nice job! You won 3 times in a row! Enjo: Ottimo lavoro! Hai vinto 3 volte di seguito! Goditi il tuo premio!
it.Watch video to get more: Guarda un video per ricevere più
it.You watched all videos for today. Come b: Hai guardato tutti i video per oggi. Ritorna domani!
it.The cookies are on waffles! Save them by: Gli oggetti sono su superfici sporche! Rimuovili abbinandoli!
it.Keep matching and remove all waffles!: Continua a creare abbinamenti e rimuovi tutte le superfici sporche!
it.Save the cookies from the blocker by mat: Libera gli oggetti dai blocchi abbinandoli!
it.Make matches around the ice to break it!: Crea degli abbinamenti attorno al ghiaccio per romperlo!
it.Stones block the cookies! Match blocked: I sassi bloccano i tuoi oggetti! Abbina gli oggetti bloccati per rimuovere i sassi!
it.Stop infections from spreading! Make a m: Fai in modo che la gelatina non si propaghi! Crea un abbinamento vicino alla gelatina per rimuoverla!
it.Complete missions to receive rewards!: Completa le missioni per ricevere premi!
it.Bring the strawberries to the bottom of: Porta il tuo cestino sul fondo della tavola creando degli abbinamenti sotto di lui!
it.Did you notice? Matching 4 gives you a s: Lo avevi notato? La combinazione di 4 elementi ti regala una sorpresa speciale!
it.Crunch! Now reach 2000 Points in 24 Move: Sgranocchia! Adesso, totalizza 2000 punti in 24 mosse!
it.Nice! Now match the bombs to make cookie: Bene! Ora, abbina le bombe di colore per far esplodere gli oggetti!
it.Match around the Ice to break it!: Crea degli abbinamenti attorno al ghiaccio per romperlo!
it.Great! Now break all the ice and collect: Ottimo! Ora, rompi tutto il ghiaccio e rimuovi tutte le superfici!
it.Nice! Keep playing to 500 points!: Bene così! Gioca ancora per totalizzare 500 punti!
it.This ice is stronger! Match twice to bre: Il ghiaccio è più duro! Ti servono due abbinamenti adiacenti per romperlo!
it.Now that's crunchy! Break it all! Fast!: Ora che scricchiola, rompilo tutto! Fai presto!
it.Match next to Chests to unlock them!: Crea abbinamenti vicino agli scrigni per sbloccarli!
it.Coins galor! Now collect your Waffles an: Hai trovato delle monete! Ora, continua e completa gli obiettivi del livello!
it.Hey! You can Match 5 with your new Boost: Ehi! Con il tuo nuovo potenziatore potrai creare una combinazione a 5!
it.Try your new Booster to help you Match m: Prova il tuo nuovo potenziatore per aiutarti a creare più combinazioni!
it.Yum! Chocolate Waffles! They require two: Ci sono delle superfici ricoperte di muschio! Occorrono due abbinamenti per rimuoverle!
it.Choco-tastic! Now collect the items in 2: Ben fatto! Ora completa il resto degli obiettivi del livello.
it.Try this and see what happens!: Prova questo e vedi cosa succede!

pt.Your level progress will be lost!: Irá perder o seu nível de progresso!
pt.Watch a video to continue playing!: Assista a um vídeo para continuar a jogar!
pt.Use the swap booster to change the place: Utilize o reforço de troca para mudar dois objetos de sítio!
pt.Use the star wand to crush one cookie!: Utilize o machado para remover um único objeto!
pt.Use the horizontal pin to clear the whol: Utilize o pin horizontal para limpar a fila toda!
pt.Use the vertical pin to clear the whole: Utilize o pin vertical para limpar a coluna toda!
pt.Nice job! You earned 3 stars! Enjoy your: Bom trabalho! Ganhou 3 estrelas! Desfrute do seu brinde!
pt.Nice job! You won 3 times in a row! Enjo: Bom trabalho! Ganhou 3 vezes de seguida! Desfrute do seu brinde!
pt.Watch video to get more: Veja um vídeo para obter mais
pt.You watched all videos for today. Come b: Já viu todos os videos por hoje. Volte novamente amanhã!
pt.The cookies are on waffles! Save them by: Os objetos estão em superfícies sujas! Remova-as, fazendo combinações neles!
pt.Keep matching and remove all waffles!: Continue a combinar e remova todas as superfícies sujas!
pt.Save the cookies from the blocker by mat: Liberte os objetos dos bloqueadores, combinando-os!
pt.Make matches around the ice to break it!: Faça combinações à volta do gelo para o partir!
pt.Stones block the cookies! Match blocked: As pedras bloqueiam os seus objetos! Combine os objetos bloqueados para remover a pedra!
pt.Stop infections from spreading! Make a m: Impeça a gelatina de se espalhar! Faça uma combinação ao lado da gelatina para a remover!
pt.Bring the strawberries to the bottom of: Traga o seu cesto para a parte inferior do tabuleiro, fazendo combinações abaixo dele!
pt.Watch a video to try again: Veja um vídeo para tentar novamente
pt.Did you notice? Matching 4 gives you a s: Reparou? 4 em linha dão-lhe uma surpresa especial!
pt.Crunch! Now reach 2000 Points in 24 Move: Crunch! Agora atinja os 2000 Pontos em 24 Jogadas!
pt.Nice! Now match the bombs to make cookie: Boa! Agora combine as bombas de cor para deixar os objetos explodirem!
pt.Match around the Ice to break it!: Faça combinações à volta do gelo para o partir!
pt.Great! Now break all the ice and collect: Ótimo! Agora parta o gelo todo e remova todas as superfícies!
pt.Nice! Keep playing to 500 points!: Boa! Continue a jogar para os 500 pontos!
pt.This ice is stronger! Match twice to bre: Este gelo é mais forte! Combine duas vezes ao lado dele para o partir!
pt.Now that's crunchy! Break it all! Fast!: Agora é crocante! Parta tudo! Depressa!
pt.Match next to Chests to unlock them!: Faça combinações ao lado dos baús para os desbloquear!
pt.Coins galor! Now collect your Waffles an: Encontrou algumas moedas! Agora avance e complete os objetivos de nível!
pt.Hey! You can Match 5 with your new Boost: Ei! Pode fazer 5 em linha com o seu novo Reforço!
pt.Try your new Booster to help you Match m: Experimente o seu novo Reforço para o ajudar a Combinar mais!
pt.Yum! Chocolate Waffles! They require two: Há superfícies cobertas de musgo! São necessárias duas combinações para as eliminar!
pt.Choco-tastic! Now collect the items in 2: Muito bem! Agora complete os restantes objetivos de nível.

ru.Use the swap booster to change the place: Используйте обменный бустер, чтобы поменять место двух объектов!
ru.Use the star wand to crush one cookie!: Используйте топор, чтобы удалить один объект!
ru.Use the horizontal pin to clear the whol: Очистите весь ряд при помощи горизонтальной волны.
ru.Use the vertical pin to clear the whole: Очистите целый столбик печенек при помощи вертикальной волны.
ru.Nice job! You earned 3 stars! Enjoy your: Отлично! Вы заработали три звезды. Получайте подарок!
ru.Nice job! You won 3 times in a row! Enjo: Отлично! Вы выиграли 3 раза подряд! Получайте подарок!
ru.You watched all videos for today. Come b: Вы просмотрели всё видео на сегодня. Возвращайтесь завтра!
ru.The cookies are on waffles! Save them by: Объекты находятся на грязных поверхностях! Удалите их, подбирая им пары!
ru.Keep matching and remove all waffles!: Продолжайте искать совпадения и удалите все грязные поверхности!
ru.Make matches around the ice to break it!: Ищите совпадения вокруг льда, чтобы сломать его!
ru.Stones block the cookies! Match blocked: Камни блокируют ваши объекты! Найдите пары заблокированным объектам, чтобы удалить камень!
ru.Stop infections from spreading! Make a m: Остановите слизь от расползания! Удалите ее одним совпадением!
ru.Bring the strawberries to the bottom of: Опустите свою корзину на дно доски, подбирая пары ниже ее!
ru.Did you notice? Matching 4 gives you a s: Вы заметили? Четыре совпадения дают вам особый сюрприз!
ru.Crunch! Now reach 2000 Points in 24 Move: Хрум! Теперь наберите 2000 очков за 24 хода!
ru.Nice! Now match the bombs to make cookie: Отлично! Теперь ищите пары цветным бомбам, чтобы взорвать объекты!
ru.Match around the Ice to break it!: Ищите совпадения вокруг льда, чтобы сломать его!
ru.Great! Now break all the ice and collect: Круто! Теперь сломайте весь лед и удалите все поверхности!
ru.This ice is stronger! Match twice to bre: Этот лед толще! Ищите два совпадения рядом со льдом, чтобы сломать его!
ru.Now that's crunchy! Break it all! Fast!: Теперь он трескается! Сломайте его весь! Быстрее!
ru.Match next to Chests to unlock them!: Ищите совпадения рядом с сундуками, чтобы разблокировать их!
ru.Coins galor! Now collect your Waffles an: Вы нашли несколько монет! Продолжайте дальше и выполняйте цели уровня!
ru.Hey! You can Match 5 with your new Boost: Привет! Вы можете делать 5 совпадений с новым бустером!
ru.Try your new Booster to help you Match m: Попробуйте новый бустер, чтобы найти больше совпадений!
ru.Yum! Chocolate Waffles! They require two: Поросшие мхом поверхности! Очистите их двумя совпадениями!
ru.Choco-tastic! Now collect the items in 2: Так держать! Теперь выполните последние цели уровня.
ru.Try this and see what happens!: Давай посмотрим, что получится, если сделать вот так!

tr.Watch a video to get: Daha fazla kazanmak için video izle
tr.Watch a video to continue playing!: Oynamaya devam etmek için bir video izle!
tr.Use the swap booster to change the place: İki nesnenin yerini değiştirmek için değiştirme yükselticisini kullan!
tr.Use the star wand to crush one cookie!: Tek bir nesneyi kaldırmak için baltayı kullan!
tr.Use the horizontal pin to clear the whol: Tüm satiri temizlemek için yatay pini kullan!
tr.Use the vertical pin to clear the whole: Tüm sütunu temizlemek için dikey pini kullan!
tr.Nice job! You earned 3 stars! Enjoy your: Aferin! 3 yildiz kazandin! Hediyenin tadini çikar!
tr.Nice job! You won 3 times in a row! Enjo: Aferin! Art arda 3 kez kazandin! Hediyenin tadini çikar!
tr.Watch video to get more: Daha fazlasini almak için bir video izle
tr.You watched all videos for today. Come b: Bugünlük tüm videolari izledin. Yarin yine gel!
tr.The cookies are on waffles! Save them by: Nesneler kirli yüzeylerin üzerindedir! Onları üstlerinde eşleştirme yaparak kaldır!
tr.Keep matching and remove all waffles!: Eşleştirmeye devam et ve tüm kirli yüzeyleri kaldır!
tr.Make matches around the ice to break it!: Buzu kırmak için onun etrafında eşleştirmeler yap!
tr.Stones block the cookies! Match blocked: Taşlar nesnelerini engeller! Taşı kaldırmak için engelli nesneleri eşleştir!
tr.Stop infections from spreading! Make a m: Bulaşıcı gülümsemenin yayılmasını durdur! Bulaşıcı gülümsemeyi ortadan kaldırmak için onun yanında bir eşleştirme yap!
tr.Bring the strawberries to the bottom of: Sepetinin altında eşleştirme yaparak sepetini tahtanın altına getir!
tr.Watch a video to try again: Tekrar denemek için bir video izle
tr.Did you notice? Matching 4 gives you a s: Fark ettin mi? 4 tane eşleştirme sana özel bir sürpriz veriyor!
tr.Crunch! Now reach 2000 Points in 24 Move: Çıtır çıtır! Şimdi 24 Hamlede 2000 Puana ulaş!
tr.Nice! Now match the bombs to make cookie: Güzel! Şimdi nesnelerin patlamasını sağlamak için renkli bombaları eşleştir!
tr.Match around the Ice to break it!: Buzu kırmak için onun etrafında eşleştirme yap!
tr.Great! Now break all the ice and collect: Harika! Şimdi tüm buzları kır ve tüm yüzeyleri kaldır!
tr.Nice! Keep playing to 500 points!: Güzel! 500 puan alana kadar oynamaya devam et!
tr.This ice is stronger! Match twice to bre: Bu buz daha güçlüdür! Bu buzu kırmak için onun yanında iki kez eşleştirme yap!
tr.Now that's crunchy! Break it all! Fast!: Şimdi çıtır çıtır! Tümünü kır! Hızlı!
tr.Match next to Chests to unlock them!: Sandıkların kilidini açmak için onlarında yanında eşleştirmeler yap!
tr.Coins galor! Now collect your Waffles an: Bazı jetonlar buldun! Şimdi devam et ve seviye hedeflerini tamamla!
tr.Try your new Booster to help you Match m: Daha fazla eşleştirmene yardımcı olacak yeni Hızlandırıcını dene!
tr.Yum! Chocolate Waffles! They require two: Yosun kaplamış yüzeyler var! Bunların temizlenmesi için iki eşleştirme gerekli!
tr.Choco-tastic! Now collect the items in 2: Çok iyi! Şimdi kalan seviye hedeflerini tamamla.

nl.Watch a video to get: Bekijk een video om te krijgen
nl.Watch a video to continue playing!: Bekijk een video om verder te spelen
nl.Use the swap booster to change the place: Gebruik de verwisselbooster om twee objecten van plaats te verwisselen!
nl.Use the star wand to crush one cookie!: Gebruik de bijl om een ​​enkel object te verwijderen!
nl.Use the horizontal pin to clear the whol: GEBRUIK DE HORIZONTALE PIN OM EEN VOLLEDIGE RIJ VRIJ TE MAKEN!
nl.Use the vertical pin to clear the whole: GEBRUIK DE VERTICALE PIN OM EEN HELE KOLOM VRIJ TE MAKEN!
nl.Nice job! You earned 3 stars! Enjoy your: Goed gedaan! Je hebt 3 sterren verdiend! Geniet van je geschenk!
nl.Nice job! You won 3 times in a row! Enjo: Goed gedaan! Je hebt 3 keer op rij gewonnen! Geniet van je geschenk!
nl.Watch video to get more: Bekijk een video om er meer te krijgen
nl.You watched all videos for today. Come b: Je hebt alle video's van vandaag bekeken. Kom morgen terug!
nl.The cookies are on waffles! Save them by: De objecten bevinden zich op vuile oppervlakken! Verwijder ze door ze te matchen!
nl.Keep matching and remove all waffles!: Blijf matchen en verwijder alle vuile oppervlakken!
nl.Save the cookies from the blocker by mat: Bevrijd objecten van blokkades door ze te matchen!
nl.Make matches around the ice to break it!: Maak matches rond het ijs om het te breken!
nl.Stones block the cookies! Match blocked: Stenen blokkeren je objecten! Match geblokkeerde objecten om het steen te verwijderen!
nl.Stop infections from spreading! Make a m: Zorg ervoor dat de gelei zich niet verspreidt! Maak een match naast de gelei om het te verwijderen!
nl.Complete missions to receive rewards!: Vervolledig missies om beloningen te krijgen!
nl.Bring the strawberries to the bottom of: Breng je mand naar de onderkant van het bord door eronder te matchen!
nl.Watch a video to try again: Bekijk een video om opnieuw te proberen
nl.Did you notice? Matching 4 gives you a s: Heb je het al gemerkt? Als je er 4 combineert, krijg je een speciale verrassing!
nl.Nice! Now match the bombs to make cookie: Goed gedaan! Match nu de kleurenbommen om de objecten te laten ontploffen!
nl.Match around the Ice to break it!: Match rond het ijs om het te breken!
nl.Great! Now break all the ice and collect: Geweldig! Breek nu al het ijs en verwijder alle oppervlakken!
nl.Nice! Keep playing to 500 points!: Goed zo! Blijf spelen tot je 500 punten hebt!
nl.This ice is stronger! Match twice to bre: Dit ijs is sterker! Match er twee keer naast om het te breken!
nl.Now that's crunchy! Break it all! Fast!: Dat kraakt pas lekker! Breek al het ijs! Snel!
nl.Match next to Chests to unlock them!: Match naast de kisten om ze te ontgrendelen!
nl.Coins galor! Now collect your Waffles an: Je hebt wat munten gevonden! Ga nu verder en voltooi alle niveaudoelstellingen!
nl.Hey! You can Match 5 with your new Boost: Hé! Je kunt 5 combinaties maken met je nieuwe booster!
nl.Try your new Booster to help you Match m: Gebruik je nieuwe booster zodat je meer combinaties kunt maken!
nl.Yum! Chocolate Waffles! They require two: Er zijn oppervlakken die met mos zijn overwoekerd! Er zijn 2 matches nodig om ze te verwijderen!
nl.Choco-tastic! Now collect the items in 2: Goed gedaan! Voltooi nu de resterende niveaudoelstellingen.

pl.Use the swap booster to change the place: Użyj zamieniacza, aby zamienić dwa obiekty miejscami!
pl.Use the star wand to crush one cookie!: Użyj topora, aby usunąć pojedynczy obiekt!
pl.Use the horizontal pin to clear the whol: Wykorzystaj poziomą pinezkę, aby wyczyścić cały rząd!
pl.Use the vertical pin to clear the whole: Wykorzystaj pionową pinezkę, aby wyczyścić całą kolumnę!
pl.Nice job! You earned 3 stars! Enjoy your: Dobra robota! Zyskujesz 3 gwiazdki! Ciesz się z prezentu!
pl.Nice job! You won 3 times in a row! Enjo: Dobra robota! Wygrałeś 3 razy z rzędu! Ciesz się z prezentu!
pl.You watched all videos for today. Come b: Obejrzałeś wszystkie filmy na dziś. Wróć jutro!
pl.The cookies are on waffles! Save them by: Obiekty znajdują się na brudnych powierzchniach! Usuń je, dokonując na nich dopasowań!
pl.Keep matching and remove all waffles!: Dopasowuj i usuwaj wszystkie brudne powierzchnie!
pl.Make matches around the ice to break it!: Dopasowuj wokół lodu, aby go przełamać!
pl.Stones block the cookies! Match blocked: Kamienie blokują obiekty! Dopasuj blokowane obiekty, aby usunąć kamień!
pl.Stop infections from spreading! Make a m: Nie dopuść, by galareta się rozprzestrzeniała! Dopasuj obok galarety, aby ją usunąć!
pl.Bring the strawberries to the bottom of: Umieść swój koszyk na samym dole planszy, dopasowując poniżej niego!
pl.Did you notice? Matching 4 gives you a s: Zauważyłeś? Za dopasowanie 4 elementów otrzymasz niespodziankę!
pl.Crunch! Now reach 2000 Points in 24 Move: Chrupiąco! A teraz zdobądź 2000 punktów w 24 ruchach!
pl.Nice! Now match the bombs to make cookie: Nieźle! A teraz dopasuj kolorowe bomby, aby obiekty wybuchały!
pl.Match around the Ice to break it!: Dopasowuj wokół lodu, aby go przełamać!
pl.Great! Now break all the ice and collect: Świetnie! A teraz przełam cały lód i usuń wszystkie powierzchnie!
pl.This ice is stronger! Match twice to bre: Ten lód jest mocniejszy! Dopasuj dwukrotnie obok niego, aby go przełamać!
pl.Now that's crunchy! Break it all! Fast!: To jest dopiero chrupiące! Połam wszystko! Szybko!
pl.Match next to Chests to unlock them!: Dopasowuj obok skrzyni, aby je odblokować!
pl.Coins galor! Now collect your Waffles an: Znalazłeś monety! Graj dalej i wypełnij zadania dla poziomu!
pl.Try your new Booster to help you Match m: Wypróbuj nowy Wspomagacz, aby dopasowywać więcej!
pl.Yum! Chocolate Waffles! They require two: Mech porósł powierzchnie! Aby je usunąć, należy dokonać dwóch dopasowań!
pl.Choco-tastic! Now collect the items in 2: Dobra robota! A teraz wypełnij pozostałe zadania dla poziomu.

ja.Watch a video to get: 動画広告を見てもらう
ja.Your level progress will be lost!: 現在のゲームが中断されます！
ja.Watch a video to continue playing!: 動画広告を見て続きをプレイ！
ja.Use the swap booster to change the place:
スワップを使って
2つ入れ替える！
ja.Use the horizontal pin to clear the whol:
水平ピンを使って
行をクリア！
ja.Use the vertical pin to clear the whole:
垂直ピンを使って
列をクリア！
ja.Thanks for watching!: 見てくれてありがとう
ja.No possible match - shuffling: 手詰まり - シャッフル中
ja.Nice job! You earned 3 stars! Enjoy your: いいね！3スターだ！ギフトをもらう！
ja.Nice job! You won 3 times in a row! Enjo: いいね！3連勝だ！ギフトをもらう！
ja.Watch video to get more: 動画広告をみてもっともらう
ja.You watched all videos for today. Come b: 本日の動画広告をすべて見た。また明日！
ja.This is how you Match 3 Cookies: こうやって３つマッチすることができるよ！
ja.The cookies are on waffles! Save them by: 汚れちゃったぞ！マッチして汚れを取ろう！
ja.Nice! Keep playing!: ナイス！プレイを続けよう！
ja.Keep matching and remove all waffles!: マッチを続けて全部の汚れを取ろう！
ja.Save the cookies from the blocker by mat: マッチして障害物から逃がそう！
ja.Make matches around the ice to break it!: 氷の隣でマッチして割る！
ja.Stones block the cookies! Match blocked: 石が邪魔だ！マッチで石を取り除こう！
ja.Try your new booster!: 新しいブースターを試そう！
ja.Stop infections from spreading! Make a m: ゼリーの増殖を止めろ！ゼリーの隣でマッチを作れ！
ja.Complete missions to receive rewards!: ミッション完了して、報酬を受けとろう！
ja.Or unlock Now: もしくは今アンロック
ja.Collect more stars!: もっとスターを集める！
ja.Or get one now: もしくは今ひとつもらう
ja.Bring the strawberries to the bottom of: すぐ下をマッチさせて、バスケットを底まで運ぶ
ja.Chest Unlocked: チェストがアンロック
ja.Watch a video to try again: 動画広告をみて再度トライ
ja.Did you notice? Matching 4 gives you a s: 気づいてた？4つのマッチで特別な驚きが！
ja.Crunch! Now reach 2000 Points in 24 Move: やるね！24ムーブで2000ポイントに到達！
ja.Nice! Now match the bombs to make cookie: ナイス！カラー爆弾とマッチさせて爆発だ！
ja.Match around the Ice to break it!: 氷のまわりをマッチさせて割れ！
ja.Great! Now break all the ice and collect: グレイト！すべての氷を割ってすべて取り除いた！
ja.Nice! Keep playing to 500 points!: ナイス！500ポイントプレイした！
ja.This ice is stronger! Match twice to bre: この氷は強い！2回マッチさせて割る！
ja.Now that's crunchy! Break it all! Fast!: バリバリする！すべて壊せ！はやく！
ja.Match next to Chests to unlock them!: 箱の隣でマッチさせて開ける！
ja.Coins galor! Now collect your Waffles an: コインを見つけた！つづけてレベルゴールを目指そう！
ja.Hey! You can Match 5 with your new Boost: やあ！新ブースターで5つマッチできるぞ！
ja.Try your new Booster to help you Match m: 新ブースターを試せば、もっとマッチできる！
ja.Yum! Chocolate Waffles! They require two: 苔で汚れている！2回マッチでクリアだ！
ja.Choco-tastic! Now collect the items in 2: よくやった！今レベルの目標を達成した！
ja.Try this and see what happens!: 試してみて、何が起こるか？
ja.Unlock at Level X:
アンロック
レベルX
